org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter

Class Mecha_Dragon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter.Collider
      • org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter.Character
        • org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter.Mecha_Dragon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Active, Visible

    public class Mecha_Dragon
extends Character
implements Visible, Active
    The only boss in the game as of now, unlike most other enemies it has a long loop of actions it performs in a set order, thus making it have a routine instead of an "Intelligence".
    Author:
    Tommi Heikkinen

        public void update(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> o,
                   Map m,
                   int delta)
        updates the character on the playground. Super.update-has all the kinematics and common stuff with character Has the pattern of the boss written down to phases divided by the current frame of the animation
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
